table.name: planting_sites
table.remarks: Top-level information about entire planting sites. Every planting site has at least one planting zone.

column.name: organization_id
column.remarks: Which organization owns this planting site.

column.name: name
column.remarks: Short name of this planting site. Must be unique within the organization.

column.name: description
column.remarks: Optional user-supplied description of the planting site.

column.name: boundary
column.remarks: Boundary of the entire planting site. Planting zones will generally fall inside this boundary. This will typically be a single polygon but may be multiple polygons if a planting site has several disjoint areas. Coordinates always use SRID 3857 (spherical pseudo-Mercator).

column.name: created_by
column.remarks: Which user created the planting site.

column.name: created_time
column.remarks: When the planting site was originally created.

column.name: modified_by
column.remarks: Which user most recently modified the planting site.

column.name: modified_time
column.remarks: When the planting site was most recently modified.

table.name: planting_zones
table.remarks: Regions within planting sites that have a consistent set of conditions such that survey results from any part of the zone can be extrapolated to the entire zone. Planting zones are subdivided into plots. Every planting zone has at least one plot.

column.name: planting_site_id
column.remarks: Which planting site this zone is part of.

column.name: name
column.remarks: Short name of this planting zone. This is often just a single letter. Must be unique within a planting site.

column.name: boundary
column.remarks: Boundary of the planting zone. This area is further subdivided into plots. This will typically be a single polygon but may be multiple polygons if a planting zone has several disjoint areas. Coordinates always use SRID 3857 (spherical pseudo-Mercator).

column.name: created_by
column.remarks: Which user created the planting zone.

column.name: created_time
column.remarks: When the planting zone was originally created.

column.name: modified_by
column.remarks: Which user most recently modified the planting zone.

column.name: modified_time
column.remarks: When the planting zone was most recently modified.

table.name: plots
table.remarks: Regions within planting zones that can be comprehensively surveyed in order to extrapolate results for the entire zone. Any plot in a zone is expected to have roughly the same number of plants of the same species as any other plot in the same zone.

column.name: boundary
column.remarks: Boundary of the plot. Coordinates always use SRID 3857 (spherical pseudo-Mercator).

column.name: created_by
column.remarks: Which user created the plot.

column.name: created_time
column.remarks: When the plot was originally created.

column.name: modified_by
column.remarks: Which user most recently modified the plot.

column.name: modified_time
column.remarks: When the plot was most recently modified.
